articles.author: Michelle Lewis
articles.title: Maxeon is going to open a 3 GW solar factory in New Mexico - Electrek
articles.description: Maxeon Solar Technologies is going to build a $1 billion silicon solar factory in New Mexico – the largest in the US.
articles.content:
Singapore-headquartered Maxeon Solar Technologies has just announced that it’s going to build a $1 billion silicon solar factory in New Mexico the largest in the US.
The 3-gigawatt factory, which wi… [+2339 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Perez
articles.title: ChatGPT expands its ‘custom instructions’ feature to free users - TechCrunch
articles.description: OpenAI announced that it's expanding custom instructions -- a way to give users more control over how ChatGPT responds -- to all users.
articles.content: OpenAI announced that it’s expanding custom instructions — a way to give users more control over how ChatGPT responds — to all users, including those on the free tier of the service. The feature, whi… [+1639 chars]
